Entree_Brute Class Reference

An Entree whose main source of data is an arbitrary binary buffer set using the
set_data() method. This Entree can then be used to feed any standard TRUST objects. More...

#include <Entree_Brute.h>

Protected Attributes

istringstream * istrstream_
char * data_

Detailed Description

An Entree whose main source of data is an arbitrary binary buffer set using the
set_data() method. This Entree can then be used to feed any standard TRUST objects.

Definition at line 38 of file Entree_Brute.h.

Definition at line 54 of file Entree_Brute.cpp.

References data_, Entree::get_istream(), istrstream_, Entree::set_istream(), and sz.

{
  if(data_)
    {
// For now forbid multiple calls ... could try deleting data_
// Cerr << "Entree_Brute::set_data(): Multiple calls forbidden!  " << finl;
// Process::exit(-1);
      delete[] data_;
      if (istrstream_)
        delete istrstream_;
      istrstream_ = new istringstream();
      set_istream(istrstream_);
    }

  const std::istream& iss = get_istream();
  std::streambuf * sb = iss.rdbuf();

  data_ = new char[sz];
  std::copy(data, data+sz, data_);
  sb->pubsetbuf(data_, sz);
}
